00059             function                __construct()
00060             {
00061                   try
00062                   {
00063                         $this->BlockSettings = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00064                         $this->CachedMultyFS = get_package_object( 'cached_multy_fs' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00065                         $this->FileInputAlgorithms = get_package( 'file_input::file_input_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00066                         $this->PageComposer = get_package( 'page::page_composer' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00067                         $this->Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00068                         $this->String = get_package( 'string' , 'last' , __FILE__ );

00102             function                apply_upload_limitations( $Code , $Name )
00103             {
00104                   try
00105                   {
00106                         $Type = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'file_types' , 'default' );
00107                         list( $FileExtensions , $FileDescription ) = $this->FileInputAlgorithms->get_file_filters( $Type );
00108                         
00109                         $Code = str_replace( '{file_types}' , $FileExtensions , $Code );
00110                         $Code = str_replace( '{file_types_description}' , $FileDescription , $Code );
00111                         $FileSizeLimit = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'file_size_limit' , '512 KB' );
00112                         $Code = str_replace( '{file_size_limit}' , $FileSizeLimit , $Code );
00113                         if( $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'single_input' , false ) )
00114                         {
00115                               $Code = str_replace( '{file_upload_limit}' , 1 , $Code );
00116                               $Code = str_replace( '{file_queue_limit}' , 1 , $Code );
00117                         }
00118                         else
00119                         {
00120                               $FileUploadLimit = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'file_upload_limit' , 0 );
00121                               $Code = str_replace( '{file_upload_limit}' , $FileUploadLimit , $Code );
00122                               $FileQueueLimit = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'file_queue_limit' , 0 );
00123                               $Code = str_replace( '{file_queue_limit}' , $FileQueueLimit , $Code );
00124                         }
00125                         
00126                         return( $Code );
00127                   }
00128                   catch( Exception $e )
00129                   {
00130                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00131                   }
00132             }

00162                         
00163                         $UploadComplete = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'upload_complete_handler' , 'uploadComplete' );
00164                         $Code = str_replace( '{upload_complete_handler}' , $UploadComplete , $Code );
00165                         
00166                         return( $Code );
00167                   }
00168                   catch( Exception $e )
00169                   {
00170                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00171                   }
00172             }

00192             function                get_uploaded_file_code()
00193             {
00194                   try
00195                   {
00196                         $Name = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'name' , 'file_input' );
00197                               
00198                         $TemplatePath = dirname( __FILE__ ).'/res/templates/file_field.tpl';
00199                         $UploadedFileCode = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $TemplatePath );
00200                         
00201                         $Data = $this->Security->get_gp( 
00202                               "$Name" , 'string' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'value' , '' )
00203                         );
00204                         $UploadedFileCode = str_replace( "{data}" , $Data , $UploadedFileCode );
00205                         
00206                         $Status = $this->Security->get_gp(
00207                               "visible_$Name" , 'string' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'visible_value' , '' )
00208                         );
00209                         $UploadedFileCode = str_replace( "{status}" , $Status , $UploadedFileCode );
00210                         
00211                         return( $UploadedFileCode );
00212                   }
00213                   catch( Exception $e )
00214                   {
00215                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00216                   }
00217             }

00237             function                compile_upload_file_component()
00238             {
00239                   try
00240                   {
00241                         $UploadedFileCode = $this->get_uploaded_file_code();
00242 
00243                         $TemplatePath = dirname( __FILE__ ).'/res/templates/file_input.tpl';
00244                         $Code = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $TemplatePath );
00245                         
00246                         $Code = str_replace( '{uploaded_file_code}' , $UploadedFileCode , $Code );
00247                         
00248                         $Url = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'upload_url' );
00249                         $Code = str_replace( '{upload_url}' , $Url , $Code );
00250                         
00251                         $Name = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'name' , 'file_input' );
00252                         $Code = $this->apply_upload_limitations( $Code , $Name );
00253                         $Code = $this->set_event_handlers( $Code );
00254                         
00255                         $Code = str_replace( '{name}' , $Name , $Code );
00256                         
00257                         return( $Code );
00258                   }
00259                   catch( Exception $e )
00260                   {
00261                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00262                   }
00263             }

00291             function                process_file_input( $ProcessingString , $Changed )
00292             {
00293                   try
00294                   {
00295                         $ProcessingString = str_replace( '{file_input}' , '{file_input:f=1}' , $ProcessingString );
00296                         
00297                         for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $ProcessingString , 'file_input' ) ; )
00298                         {
00299                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
00300                               
00301                               $Code = $this->compile_upload_file_component();
00302                               
00303                               $ProcessingString = str_replace( "{file_input:$MacroParameters}" , $Code , $ProcessingString );
00304                               $Changed = true;
00305                         }
00306                         
00307                         return( array( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) );
00308                   }
00309                   catch( Exception $e )
00310                   {
00311                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00312                   }
00313             }
00314             
00345             function                process_string( $Options , $ProcessingString , &$Changed )
00346             {
00347                   try
00348                   {
00349                         list( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) = $this->process_file_input( $ProcessingString , $Changed );
00350                         
00351                         return( $ProcessingString );
00352                   }
00353                   catch( Exception $e )
00354                   {
00355                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00356                   }
00357             }
